text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem medicationdispense-performer-function

Last updated: 2024-04-24 00:00:00+0000

Profile: Shareable CodeSystem

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/medicationdispense-performer-function defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
dataenterer Data EntererRecorded the details of the request
packager PackagerPrepared the medication.
checker CheckerPerformed initial quality assurance on the prepared medication
finalchecker Final CheckerPerformed the final quality assurance on the prepared medication against the request. Typically, this is a pharmacist function.
counsellor CounsellorProvided the drug information to the patient at the time of dispensing.

name: MedicationDispensePerformerFunctionCodes
title: MedicationDispense Performer Function Codes

concept.definition: Recorded the details of the request
Performed initial quality assurance on the prepared medication
Performed the final quality assurance on the prepared medication against the request. Typically, this is a pharmacist function.
Provided the drug information to the patient at the time of dispensing.
